title: An Improved Strategy for Blood Glucose Control Using Multi-Step Deep Reinforcement Learning
abstract: arXiv:2403.07566v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: Blood Glucose (BG) control involves keeping an individual's BG within a healthy range through extracorporeal insulin injections is an important task for people with type 1 diabetes. However,traditional patient self-management is cumbersome and risky. Recent research has been devoted to exploring individualized and automated BG control approaches, among which Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL) shows potential as an emerging approach.
